title: "FPJ-Ed: IIIT Hyderabad announces one-year Translation Fellowship for working professionals"
excerpt: "Hyderabad: A year-long Research Translation Fellowship for working professionals to work on creating products from emerging research is announced by IIIT Hyderabad. The full-time fellowship will include a stipend and a chance to work with research groups and professors."
